name: Minion Masters - Outlandish Operations
descr:
[h2]关于此内容[/h2]
[b]Outlandish Operations DLC[/b]
Outlandish Operations is the Faction Box for starting or expanding your Outlander faction collection. This is a great +300% value bundle of Outlander cards and Master, including the outlaw Settsu (Master), and get a headstart in this month’s Season Pass!

[b]Includes:[/b]
[list][li]Settsu (Master)
[/li][li]Infested Settsu Skin (Legendary Master Skin)
[/li][li]5x Infiltration (Supreme)
[/li][li]20x A.I.M Bot
[/li][li]40x Beam Of Doom
[/li][li]40x S.T.INT
[/li][li]5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
[/li][li]3x Season Pass Tiers[/li][/list] 
The high-tech Outlanders employ ranged minions and a formidable air force to outmaneuver their enemies. Build up your Outlander Tech by playing Outlander cards, which empowers certain Outlander machines to make a strong push, then finish off your opponent by dropping off marines behind enemy lines with Infiltration, and combine it with Settsu’s Blast Entry for an extra devastating finish.
With this Faction Box, you have the perfect kit to become an Outlander Prime!
detail:
名称: Minion Masters - Outlandish Operations
类型: 动作, 冒险, 免费开玩, 独立, 角色扮演, 策略
开发商: BetaDwarf
发行商: BetaDwarf
发行日期: 2021 年 3 月 5 日
review: 全部评测: 无用户评测
全部评测: 无用户评测
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
处理器: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: Mac OS X 10.12.4+
处理器: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
内存: 4 GB RAM
存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 2 月 15 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将不再支持 32 位游戏及 macOS 10.14 或更低版本。
